t:test_case.t:steps: 1. Auth with admin 2. create accounts

addheader "X-NewHeader" "Test"; deleteheader :value "ge" :comparator "i;ascii-casemap" "X-NewHeader" "Test";
1. Auth with admin 2. set sieve rule in account1 3. auth with account 4. send mail from account to account1 5. auth with account1 6. find and verify email headers

addheader "X-NewHeader" "Test"; replaceheader :newname "X-Sieve" :newvalue "Sieve1" :value "eq" :comparator "i;ascii-casemap" "X-NewHeader" "Test";
1. Auth with admin 2. set sieve rule in account11 3. auth with account 4. send mail from account to account11 5. auth with account11 6. find and verify email headers

addheader "X-NewHeader" "1" addheader "X-NewHeader" "2" addheader "X-NewHeader" "3" replaceheader :newname "X-Test" :newvalue "Sieve10" :value "eq" :comparator "i;ascii-numeric" "X-NewHeader" "2"; replaceheader :newname "X-Test" :newvalue "Sieve11" :last :value "gt" :comparator "i;ascii-numeric" "X-NewHeader" "1";
1. Auth with admin 2. set sieve rule in account20 3. auth with account 4. send mail from account to account20 5. auth with account20 6. find and verify email headers

t:test_case.t:objective: deleteheader use :is match type if no match type argument is supplied
t:test_case.t:steps:
deleteheader :comparator "i;ascii-numeric" "Subject" "1";
1. Auth with admin 2. set sieve rule in account22 3. auth with account 4. send mail with Subject is 1 from account to account22 5. auth with account22 6. find and verify email headers

t:test_case.t:objective: deleteheader command support :is match type with i;ascii-numeric
t:test_case.t:steps: deleteheader :is :comparator "i;ascii-numeric" "Subject" "1"; 1. Auth with admin 2. set sieve rule in account23 3. auth with account 4. send mail with Subject is 1 from account to account23 5. auth with account23 6. find and verify email headers

t:test_case.t:objective: replaceheader use ":is" match type if no match type argument is supplied
t:test_case.t:steps:
replaceheader :newvalue "Sieve24" :comparator "i;ascii-numeric" "Subject" "1";}
1. Auth with admin 2. set sieve rule in account24 3. auth with account 4. send mail with Subject is 1 from account to account24 5. auth with account24 6. find and verify email headers

t:test_case.t:objective: replaceheader command support :is match type with i;ascii-numeric
t:test_case.t:steps:
replaceheader :newvalue "Sieve25" :is :comparator "i;ascii-numeric" "Subject" "1";
1. Auth with admin 2. set sieve rule in account25 3. auth with account 4. send mail with Subject is 1 from account to account25 5. auth with account25 6. find and verify email headers
